sections.text:
100. Unless the provision or context otherwise requires, these definitions shall govern the construction of this code.

(Enacted by Stats. 1959, Ch. 3.)

(Enacted by Stats. 1959, Ch. 3.)

101. California public contract law should be efficient and the product of the best of modern practice and research.

(Added by Stats. 1984, Ch. 42, Sec. 1.)

(Added by Stats. 1984, Ch. 42, Sec. 1.)

102. “Ability to respond in damages” means financial responsibility.

(Added by renumbering Section 95 by Stats. 1992, Ch. 974, Sec. 2. Effective September 28, 1992.)

(Added by renumbering Section 95 by Stats. 1992, Ch. 974, Sec. 2. Effective September 28, 1992.)
